duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for managing the functionality of the shifts and ensuring all shifts are adequately staffed to execute the daily workload.
Develop, maintain, and manage facility quality processes to optimize operations.
Manage daily/weekly/monthly quality and productivity reporting.
Supervise realignment activities to ensure maximum optimization of the facility.
Provide direct supervision to shift supervisors and team members, driving professional growth.
Responsible for all facility/equipment maintenance and supplies, and ensuring a safe working environment.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree with emphasis on Logistics or Operations Management (Master's preferred)
